other_tests.findings: The 5 cm abscess under the diaphragm was drained under CT guidance, and a drain was left in place.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The intra-abdominal abscess showed decreased in size on follow-up CT scan.

other_tests.findings: Several areas of hyperintensity in the left parietal region and a small focus in the left occipital region indicative of subacute infarcts. Chronic infarct seen in the right occipital lobe. Mild-to-moderate small vessel disease and moderate brain atrophy identified.
Absence of flow signal in the left internal carotid artery indicative of occlusion. Flow signal identified in the left middle cerebral artery likely due to collateral flow.
